subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Federer, 33, was relatively upbeat after losing to Novak Djokovic in the Wimbledon final for the second straight year, saying, “You can have good tournaments without winning.”
snippet: Federer, 33, was relatively upbeat after losing to Novak Djokovic in the Wimbledon final for the second straight year, saying, “You can have good tournaments without winning.”
